name: Probuilder SciFi Facility Reference
description:
Unfortunately the webgl build was having some problems loading up here. It was giving me the "out of memory error." After trying a couple of times optimizing and increasing the memory, I decided to just upload the downloadable standalone files instead. There is one for windows and macs. Enjoy.

Also, I inserted a really cool and free music track from the asset store that really added a lot to the atmosphere of my small level. Pretty Neat.
